trans-unit.source: The mobile service project that you download lets you to run your new mobile service right on your local computer or virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: The mobile service project that you download lets you to run your new mobile service right on your local computer or virtual machine.

trans-unit.source: This makes it easy to debug your service code before you even publish it to Azure.
trans-unit.target: This makes it easy to debug your service code before you even publish it to Azure.

trans-unit.source: In this section, you will test your new app against the mobile service running locally.
trans-unit.target: In this section, you will test your new app against the mobile service running locally.

trans-unit.source: Browse to the location where you saved the compressed project files, expand the files on your computer, and open the solution file in Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: Browse to the location where you saved the compressed project files, expand the files on your computer, and open the solution file in Visual Studio.

trans-unit.source: In the Solution Explorer in Visual Studio, right-click your service project, click Set as StartUp Project, and then press the F5 key to build the project and start the mobile service locally.
trans-unit.target: In the Solution Explorer in Visual Studio, right-click your service project, click Set as StartUp Project, and then press the F5 key to build the project and start the mobile service locally.

trans-unit.source: A web page is displayed after the mobile service starts successfully.
trans-unit.target: A web page is displayed after the mobile service starts successfully.

trans-unit.source: To test the store app, right-click your client app project, click Set as StartUp Project, and then press the F5 key to rebuild the project and start the app.
trans-unit.target: To test the store app, right-click your client app project, click Set as StartUp Project, and then press the F5 key to rebuild the project and start the app.

trans-unit.source: This starts the app, which connects to the local mobile service instance.
trans-unit.target: This starts the app, which connects to the local mobile service instance.

trans-unit.source: In the app, type meaningful text, such as _Complete the tutorial_, in Insert a TodoItem, and then click Save.
trans-unit.target: In the app, type meaningful text, such as _Complete the tutorial_, in Insert a TodoItem, and then click Save.

trans-unit.source: This sends a POST request to the local mobile service.
trans-unit.target: This sends a POST request to the local mobile service.

trans-unit.source: Data from the request is inserted into the TodoItem table.
trans-unit.target: Data from the request is inserted into the TodoItem table.

trans-unit.source: Items stored in the table are returned by the mobile service, and the data is displayed in the second column in the app.
trans-unit.target: Items stored in the table are returned by the mobile service, and the data is displayed in the second column in the app.
